sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'
// import PropTypes from 'prop-types'
import styled from 'styled-components'

export class product extends Component {
  static propTypes = {

  }

  render() {
    return (
      <Container>
        <Wrapper>
            <ProductImg>
                <Image_ src = "https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0087/6193/3920/products/DD1381200_DEOA_2_720x.jpg?v=1612816087" 
                alt=""/>
            </ProductImg>
            <ProductInfo>
                <NameBrandContainer>
                  <Name>Apollo</Name>
                  <Brand>Running Short</Brand>
                </NameBrandContainer>
                <AttributesContainer>
                  <AttributeType> </AttributeType>
                  <AttributeItems>
                    
                  </AttributeItems>
                  <Price></Price>
                </AttributesContainer>
                <Button></Button>
                <ProductDescription></ProductDescription>
            </ProductInfo>
        </Wrapper>
      </Container>
    )
  }
}

export default product

const Container = styled.div`

`
const Wrapper = styled.div`
  justify-content: ;

`
const ProductImg = styled.div`
  margin-left: 150px
   `
const Image_ = styled.img`
  height: 100vh;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: flex-start;
  border: 0.5px ;
  
   `
const ProductInfo = styled.div`

`
const NameBrandContainer = styled.div`
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  right: 0;
  margin 1px;
  justify-content
`
const Brand = styled.span`

`
const Name = styled.span`
  // font-weight: 600;
`
const AttributesContainer = styled.div`

`
const AttributeType = styled.span`

`
const AttributeItems = styled.div`

`
const Price = styled.span`

`
const Button = styled.div`

`
const ProductDescription = styled.span`

`
